name: Radical I/O
description:
Radical I/O is a mobile & web development studio and consultancy with additional expertise in API development, cloud integrations, and scalable solutions. Founded in 2014 and proud to be based in Vancouver, BC, it is led by Ian & Briana Sim.
We understand what it takes to build software to support large numbers of users. We have clients in the banking, medical, education, and technology industries. Radical I/O can take you from your beginning start-up idea to running enterprise-scale deployments.
